free_your_mind.name: Free Your Mind
free_your_mind.description: Begin your journey to awakening. Find Morpheus and learn the truth about the Matrix.

stages.name: Find Morpheus
stages.description: Locate the rebel leader Morpheus in the Dojo.
stages.dialogue: You've heard whispers about a man named Morpheus who knows the truth...

stages.name: The Choice
stages.description: Morpheus offers you two pills. Your choice will change everything.

objectives.description: Make your choice: take red or take blue

stages.dialogue: This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back.
stages.completion: You have chosen to see how deep the rabbit hole goes.

stages.name: Combat Training
stages.description: Prove yourself in combat against a training program.
stages.dialogue: Now, show me what you've learned. Your mind makes it real.

the_oracle.name: The Oracle
the_oracle.description: Seek the Oracle and learn what the future holds for you.

stages.name: Find the Oracle
stages.description: Navigate through the city to find the Oracle's apartment.
stages.dialogue: The Oracle can tell you what you need to know. But first, you must find her. Be careful - the path is guarded.

stages.name: Prove Yourself to Seraph
stages.description: Seraph guards the Oracle. You must prove your worth through combat.
stages.dialogue: You do not truly know someone until you fight them.
stages.completion: Good. The Oracle will see you now.

stages.name: The Prophecy
stages.description: Speak with the Oracle and receive her wisdom.
stages.completion: Being The One is just like being in love. No one can tell you you're in love, you just know it.

rescue_morpheus.name: Rescue Morpheus
rescue_morpheus.description: Morpheus has been captured by Agents and taken to a government building. Storm the building and save him.

stages.name: Assemble at the Helipad
stages.description: Meet Trinity at the extraction point.
stages.dialogue: Morpheus believed something. I'm not sure I believe it anymore, but it doesn't matter. He's the reason I'm alive.

stages.name: Infiltrate the Building
stages.description: Fight through the government building to reach the interrogation floor.
stages.dialogue: There are only two ways out of this building. One is that scaffold, the other is in their custody. You take their route, and you take your chances.
stages.completion: Almost there. Morpheus is just ahead.

stages.name: Face the Agents
stages.description: Defeat Agent Smith and free Morpheus.
stages.dialogue: No one has ever faced an Agent and lived. No one except you.
stages.completion: You moved like they do. I've never seen anyone move that fast.

the_source.name: The Source
the_source.description: Reach the Source and confront the Architect. The fate of humanity rests on your choice.

stages.name: The Hall of Doors
stages.description: Find the entrance to the Source, hidden deep within the Matrix.
stages.dialogue: The path of The One ends at the Source. There you will find the truth about the Matrix, and yourself.

stages.name: The Architect
stages.description: Confront the creator of the Matrix.

stages.name: The Final Choice
stages.description: The Architect presents two doors. Choose the fate of humanity.
stages.dialogue: The door to your left leads to the Source, and the salvation of Zion. The door to your right leads back to the Matrix, to her, and to the end of your species.
stages.completion: The choice you have already made. Now you must understand it.

exile_business.name: Exile Business
exile_business.description: The Merovingian has a job for you. Work for the exiles and earn their favor.

stages.name: Data Collection
stages.description: Collect digital artifacts for the Merovingian.
stages.dialogue: I am a trafficker of information. I know everything I can. Bring me what I need, and I will reward you.
stages.completion: You have proven useful. Perhaps we will do business again.
